Package com.composum.sling.nodes

Annotation Type NodesConfigImpl.Configuration

  • public static @interface NodesConfigImpl.Configuration
    Configuration object for NodesConfiguration. The method naming is due to backwards compatibility.

    • Optional Element Summary

    • Element Detail

      • console_access_check

        boolean console_access_check
        Default:
        true

      • console_categories

        String[] console_categories
        Default:
        {"core", "system", "nodes", "users"}

      • query_result_limit

        long query_result_limit
        Default:
        500L

      • node_page_filter

        String node_page_filter
        Default:
        "or{ResourceType(+\'^[a-z]+:.*([Ss]ite|[Pp]age)$\'),and{PrimaryType(+\'^nt:file$\'),MimeType(+\'^text/html$\')}}"

      • node_default_filter

        String node_default_filter
        Default:
        "and{Name(-\'^rep:(repo)?[Pp]olicy$\'),Path(-\'^/(api|bin|services|servlet)(/.*)?$,^/[^/]+\\.servlet(/.*)?$,^/(jcr:)?system(/.*)?$\'),Property(servletClass!)}"

      • tree_intermediate_filter

        String tree_intermediate_filter
        Default:
        "or{Folder(),PrimaryType(+\'^dam:Asset(Content)?$\')}"

      • node_referenceable_filter

        String node_referenceable_filter
        Default:
        "Type(mix:referenceable)"

      • node_orderable_filter

        String node_orderable_filter
        Default:
        "and{or{Type(node:orderable),PrimaryType(+\'^.*([Oo]rdered|[Pp]age).*$,^sling:(Mapping)$,^nt:(unstructured|frozenNode)$,^rep:(ACL|Members|system)$\')},PrimaryType(-\'^rep:root$\')}"

      • node_source_filter

        String node_source_filter
        Default:
        "PrimaryType(-\'^cpp:(Statistics)$,^rep:(.+)$\')"

      • node_source_folder_filter

        String node_source_folder_filter
        Default:
        "or{NodeType(+\'^nt:hierarchyNode$,^vlt:HierarchyNode$\'),Name(+\'^cq:dialog$,^cq:htmlTag$,^cq:template$,^cq:design_dialog$,^cq:childEditConfig$\')}"

      • node_source_xml_filter

        String node_source_xml_filter
        Default:
        "NodeType(+\'^vlt:FullCoverage$,^mix:language$,^rep:AccessControl$,^rep:Policy$,^cq:EditConfig$,^cq:WorkflowModel$,^sling:OsgiConfig$\')"

      • node_source_advanced_attributesort

        boolean node_source_advanced_attributesort
        Default:
        true

      • scene_content_root

        String scene_content_root
        Default:
        "/var/composum/nodes/scenes"
